name: Shark Bait (n00begon)
description:
A Shoot 'em Up without any shooting.

Fly your helicopter past flocks of birds to rescue the sailors from their raft.

Use Arrow key or WASD to control your chopper.

Created for gmtkjam 2018 'Genre without Mechanic'

All art hand drawn

Music:

"Five Armies" Kevin MacLeod (incompetech.com)
